resources:
<node name="quest0_answer" value="
1. FullReader+ supports all the main formats of the text documents: fb2, epub, doc, rtf, txt, html, mobi, pdf, djvu, xps, cbz, Docx (supported by Android 4.0, and higher), odf (Android 3.0, and higher), cbr (Android 2.3 and higher), zip and rar with text formats inside; their quantity will increase together with the updates.
2. A convenient text toolbox gives you multitude opportunities:
• highlight the fragments you like and save them as quotations;
• send the texts or their extracts by e-mail with a mere click;
• share the quotations with your friends via social networks (a program for the work with a social network is demanded);
• send quotations via SMS;
• create quick bookmarks on pages to continue reading from the place you have stopped at;
• translate the highlighted text fragment by means of a built-in translator or use additional dictionaries.
3. A free unlimited online supply of various books is at your disposal. They will be available to you due to OPDS libraries that you will easily add at your discretion.
4. An easy adjustment of the “Day-Night” mode makes your reading comfortable in the day- and nighttime.
5. An online synchronization of pages you have last read, bookmarks, and quotations via Dropbox cloud storage will perfectly suit your taste if you read from one or more devices.
6. «Tap-zones» are available in the e-book reader; you can adjust them to your demands.
7. An opportunity to read Docx by means of a plugin the e-book reader will offer to install as you open a Docx file. After the plugin installation you will enjoy the file contents as you open it again.
8. An inner file browser FullReader+ will let you fulfill various operations with files, as copying, deleting, renaming, etc. ">
<node name="quest1_answer" value="
General settings offer you:
• to select the interface language (Russian, Ukrainian, German, English, French);
• to set a limit of time you have already spent reading (an hour, two or more);
• to select a convenient screen orientation (vertical/horizontal) and either fix it or make it dynamic – automatically changing after a 90 degree turn of the device. ">
<node name="quest2_answer" value="
View preferences propose:
• the interface theme selection;
• the brightness adjustment by an easy move of the finger up and down along the left edge of the screen. ">
<node name="quest3_answer" value="
In this option you may:
• set font properties (smooth and sharp), type, size and patterns of fonts;
• set up the text alignment comfortable for you (left or right justified, center or fully justified);
• select line spacing and paragraph indention;
• assign hyphenation/word wrap;
• configure other styles of epigraph and text title design. ">
<node name="quest4_answer" value="
This option lets you either select the wallpaper for reading from a given list or download the wallpaper or add your own wallpaper for reading (place files with wallpapers in /sdcard/Wallpapers), if there is no folder, you should create it. Wallpaper formats supported are jpg and png. The maximum size is 2560x1440. Wallpaper representation can be adjusted maximally comfortable for you if you use the special option “Wallpaper adjustment”. This option also offers you to set the color of the font and other text elements of the e-book reader. ">
<node name="quest5_answer" value="
- These settings easily apply the “Day/Night” mode for your comfortable reading in any lighting condition. It can be done automatically (if you set the time threshold, e.g. 20.00) or you can do it manually. You can also select the Double tap mode that will open the dialog of move mode and menu.
- In the dictionary settings you can choose one of the 4 dictionaries and define some functions for them.
- set a convenient page turning mode so that you could enjoy your favorite book without any distraction. It can be done automatically at a certain interval chosen by you (e.g. each 30 seconds) or you can do it manually as you tap the screen (by means of a volume rocker). Owing to the animation, the process of the page turning will be realistic and beautiful: it can be three-dimensional, it can be a shift or a shift with a covering, and you can also select the speed of the page turning. Our program gives an opportunity to set the pages in motion vertically as a strip or horizontally as an ordinary e-book. ">
<node name="quest6_answer" value="
• When reading the menu, you can choose to view the entire screen.
• Adding any TTF / OTF fonts (put them in a folder Fonts, / sdcard / Fonts, then just choose your desired settings font);
• When you select a set of buttons appears citations to save, send citations in the social. network, copy to clipboard and transfer through an interpreter.">
<node name="quest7_answer" value="
This option lets you activate the online synchronization of your bookmarks, quotations and the last visited pages by means of the Dropbox cloud storage. This function is essential to let you comfortably continue reading the book using any of your devices. This facility will also allow you to restore the information in case of the system failure. In order to use the synchronization you should log in using your Dropbox account (notice: you should have the same Dropbox account on all the devices you plan to use for the synchronization). You have to provide all your devices with the same books for the correct work of the function, as the synchronization is realized for particular elements of the document you read. ">
<node name="quest8_answer" value="
This facility enables you to set your personal management of the app functions while you read. Thus one tap on the definite screen area permits you to change brightness, font, color settings etc. You can enjoy the horizontal and vertical orientation of the function, 3 active zones can be set in each of them. ">

3. JUnRAR - free utility for RAR archives
License for use and distribution of FREE portable version
The source code of UnRAR utility is freeware. This means:
1. All copyrights to RAR and the utility UnRAR are exclusively owned by the author - Alexander Roshal.
2. The UnRAR sources may be used in any software to handle RAR archives without limitations free of charge, but cannot be used to re-create the RAR compression algorithm, which is proprietary. Distribution of modified UnRAR sources in separate form or as a part of other software is permitted, provided that it is clearly stated in the documentation and source comments that the code may not be used to develop a RAR (WinRAR) compatible archiver.
3. The UnRAR utility may be freely distributed. It is allowed to distribute UnRAR inside of other software packages.
4. THE RAR ARCHIVER AND THE UnRAR UTILITY ARE DISTRIBUTED «AS IS». NO WARRANTY OF ANY KIND IS EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED. YOU USE AT YOUR OWN RISK. THE AUTHOR WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR DATA LOSS, DAMAGES, LOSS OF PROFITS OR ANY OTHER KIND OF LOSS WHILE USING OR MISUSING THIS SOFTWARE.
5. Installing and using the UnRAR utility signifies acceptance of these terms and conditions of the license.
6. If you don't agree with terms of the license you must remove UnRAR files from your storage devices and cease to use the utility.
Thank you for your interest in RAR and UnRAR.
Alexander L. Roshal
